speaker: patient
text: I haven't been sleeping too well and my head hurts.

speaker: doctor
text: Oh I'm sorry to hear that. How long has this been going on?

speaker: doctor
text: Could you describe the headaches a bit for me?

speaker: patient
text: They're like a dull ache you know? Sort of always there and just like that, like usually it feels that way when I don't sleep well
